Name: Explore Product Features and Add to Favorites in Tool Shop
Description: Navigate the Tool Shop homepage, view product details, increase quantity, and add items to favorites. Verify navigation back to the homepage.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on link dynamicObject (page4)
Step 3: Click on link productView (crossHeadScrews) -> Navigate to page 'product#product/*'
Step 4: Click on button increaseQuantity
Step 5: Click on button addToFavorites
Step 6: Click on link productDetails (m4NutsMoreInfo)
Step 7: Click on link productDetails (washersMoreInfo)
Step 8: Click on p fastenersForgeFlexTools -> Navigate to page ''
Step 9: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Verify Adding Tools to Cart and Resetting Password in Tool Shop

Step 16: Enter input value in input email
Step 17: Click on input setNewPassword -> Navigate to page ''
